price: 6. Caad se, waxaa lagu halaagay dabeyl daran oo qabow badan.
arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā ʿādun fa-uh'likū birīḥin ṣarṣarin ʿātiyatin
